Keith Hendershot – Database Team – Battle Team
= Introduction =

*Requirements*

1.   The database shall store all information about the players who are    
     battling each other.
2.   The database shall contain all information on each player’s 
     ecosystems.
3.   The information contained on the database shall be used to determine each player’s score.
 
*Component Design*
1.   One database per server
2.   One table per battle


*Deliverables (Based on demand from other components)*
1.   A database containing all the necessary information.
2.   Maintenance of the database.
3.   Appropriate access schema available upon request from other    
     component teams.
